text: William Gale "Will" Vinton (November 17, 1947 â€“ October 4, 2018) was an American animator and filmmaker. He won an Oscar for his work and several Emmy Awards and Clio Awards. He was born in McMinnville, Oregon. Vinton was known for his works The California Raisins, The Adventures of Mark Twain and Return to Oz. Vinton died of multiple myeloma in Portland, Oregon on October 4, 2018 at the age of 70.Portland's Will Vinton, creator of famous Claymation characters, dies ==References== ==Other websites== *Vinton Entertainment *LAIKA, previously Vinton Studios *Freewill Entertainment *willvinton.net , Will Vinton's Claymation and Stopmotion Animation Site * Category:Academy Award winning editors Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1947 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:American animators Category:American movie directors Category:American screenwriters Category:American editors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon Category:Writers from Oregon Category:Clio Award winners
title: Will Vinton
